actions.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.2150.

official_title: To authorize issuance of a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel AFTERSAIL.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.

titles.title: To authorize issuance of a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel AFTERSAIL.
